Description: Textile fragment; torn strip of undyed linen cloth of medium-fine quality; stains of resin(?); the cloth has partly rotted where it has come into contact with this material. The edges have been cut. The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.28 ends per 10mm and weft c.16 picks per 10mm.
